translation.en: [man] There's really nothing... goin' on in Chinle.
translation.it: Non c'è davvero nulla da fare a Chinle.

translation.en: There's no clubs. No dance, no movie theater...
translation.it: Non ci sono locali né discoteche né cinema...

translation.en: There's really no outlet
for the kids or the adults.
translation.it: per i ragazzi né per gli adulti.

translation.en: We're on the rez.
It's like, uh... alcohol and the, uh...
bad side of life... home environment,
translation.it: ...il lato brutto della vita, l'ambiente domestico,

translation.en: violence, maybe...
havin', uh... alcoholic parents and stuff.
Chinle basketball is kind of, like, uh...
translation.it: Il basket a Chinle è una sorta...

translation.en: an addiction to some people.
It brings a little bit of happiness for them.
translation.it: Porta loro un po' di felicità.

translation.en: [man] Our student athletes are kind of a... a modern-day warrior.
translation.it: I nostri studenti-atleti sono guerrieri moderni.

translation.en: And in our culture,
a warrior is defined as somebody who represents their people...
translation.it: un guerriero rappresenta la sua gente.

translation.en: not just a fighter.
[commentator] Fired and locked down.
[laughs] I love it.
[boy] This team actually could make history for Chinle.
translation.it: Questa squadra può fare la storia.

translation.en: It could win Chinle's first state championship, you know.
translation.it: Potrebbe vincere il primo titolo statale.

translation.en: We always dream big.
Good job! Good job!
[man] If we could raise a state title banner,
the pride it would bring to our community...
It... It would mean everything.
A state title is a chance for our kids to get noticed
translation.it: Un titolo statale è un'occasione per i ragazzi di farsi notare oltre la riserva

translation.en: outside the reservation,
translation.it: di farsi notare oltre la riserva

translation.en: and maybe even give them a shot at a better life.
translation.it: e magari avere l'occasione di vivere meglio.

translation.en: [commentator] What a night. What a night at Chinle.
[man] We want them to make history in Chinle.
They have that potential.
It's... it's right there for them.
And this year, I believe we can finally do it.
translation.it: E credo che quest'anno potremmo farcela.

translation.en: [Shaun] Chinle is a town of about 4,500 people.
translation.it: A Chinle ci sono circa 4.500 abitanti.

translation.en: It's right in the heart of the Navajo Nation.
translation.it: È nel cuore della Nazione Navajo

translation.en: The Nation is over 27,000 square miles,
translation.it: che si estende per oltre 70.000 chilometri quadrati

translation.en: and it extends into three different states,
Arizona, Utah and New Mexico.
In northeastern Arizona, we don't have a Triple-A farm team.
translation.it: Qui nel nord-est, non abbiamo squadre in triplo A.

translation.en: We don't have a semi-pro football or baseball team.
translation.it: Non ci sono squadre di football o di baseball semiprofessionistiche.

translation.en: We have a high school basketball team.
translation.it: C'è la squadra di basket della scuola.

translation.en: -Hello. -Hey, Sophie, Shaun here.
-Shaun. Good morning. -Good morning.
Five years ago, when I was first hired as athletic director,
translation.it: Quando ho iniziato a gestire la squadra, cinque anni fa,

translation.en: our basketball team won four games,
and that's just not gonna cut it around here.
translation.it: e non bastava da queste parti.

translation.en: -Okay. Thanks, Sophie. -Bye.
The way I view this whole department,
is I want the best for my kids.
translation.it: cercando il meglio per i ragazzi.

translation.en: I call all these kids "my kids".
You know, I want the best coach available for my kids.
translation.it: Voglio il miglior allenatore possibile per i miei ragazzi.

translation.en: We decided we wanted Coach Mendoza,
and we were able to land him two years ago.
translation.it: e due anni fa siamo riusciti ad averlo.

translation.en: He's coached for over 40 years.
He's been to eight final fours.
He's been to four state title games,
translation.it: È arrivato in finale quattro volte

translation.en: and he's even won the Arizona state championships.
translation.it: e ha anche vinto il campionato dell'Arizona.

translation.en: He's a legend on the rez.
And, oh, yeah, name me one other high school coach in America
translation.it: Trovami un altro allenatore di una squadra scolastica

translation.en: that has had Kareem Abdul-Jabbar as an assistant coach.
translation.it: che abbia avuto Kareem Abdul-Jabbar come vice.

translation.en: I'll see you.
[Shaun] He knows the struggles we deal with,
he knows what it takes to take a team like ours
translation.it: sa cosa serve perché una squadra come la nostra

translation.en: deep into the tournament bracket.
Got to keep the dogs out.
[Coach Mendoza] As a head coach, my whole purpose is to win a state championship.
translation.it: Come allenatore, il mio obiettivo è vincere il campionato statale.

translation.en: I knew that Chinle's always had talent.
translation.it: C'è sempre stato talento a Chinle.

translation.en: With my background, I always believed that there's always a first time.
translation.it: Per esperienza, credo ci sia sempre una prima volta.

translation.en: And so, when I first came up here two years back, I said, "Hey, we wanna win a state championship."
translation.it: Al mio arrivo, due anni fa, ho detto: "Vogliamo vincere il campionato statale".

translation.en: Right away, I started telling the kids that, you know, that's our goal.
translation.it: Ho chiarito l'obiettivo ai ragazzi fin da subito.

translation.en: Saying, "You gotta believe, you gotta believe."
I think with the kids, a lot of it is psychological.
translation.it: Credo sia in gran parte una questione psicologica.

translation.en: So we've been talking about a lot of things and trying to build up to this point,
translation.it: Perciò abbiamo parlato molto e abbiamo cercato di prepararci.

translation.en: you know, trying to get them to relax
to where they... they're able to... to go and play,
and not worry about other things, distractions...
translation.it: senza preoccuparsi del resto o distrarsi, vedremo.

translation.en: But, we'll see.
Coach Mendoza, he knows what it takes to change lives,
translation.it: Mendoza sa cosa serve per... ...cambiare le vite

translation.en: using basketball as a catalyst with education.
translation.it: usando il basket e l'istruzione come stimoli.

translation.en: There's many student athletes he's coached that have received college scholarships,
translation.it: Molti degli studenti che ha allenato hanno ottenuto borse di studio

translation.en: that are off doing bigger and better things in the world.
translation.it: che li hanno portati a fare grandi cose.

translation.en: Before I came here, they had ten coaches in... in eight years.
translation.it: Prima di me, hanno avuto dieci allenatori in otto anni.

translation.en: So, if Chinle will keep me here,
I would love to stay here and coach for...
translation.it: sarò felice di restare e allenare...

translation.en: for a long time.
But that's not a... a given.
Hey, if we... if we play well, everything will fall in place.
translation.it: Se giochiamo bene, andrà tutto come deve andare.

translation.en: If we don't play well, then...
we don't get it done.
Okay.
Meal check for tomorrow...
Okay, good.
-Plus car. -Thank you.
The kids will love to know that we've got meals.
translation.it: Sapere che il pasto è pagato li farà felici.

translation.en: -All right. All right, Coach. -Thank you.
[Raul] Okay, on the baseline.
[Raul] Hustle.
Okay, listen.
Now, tomorrow... first game of the year. You have to know what you're doing.
translation.it: Domani c'è la prima partita dell'anno. Dovete sapere cosa fate.

translation.en: The biggest thing you've got to remember, if we can take care of the ball,
translation.it: La cosa più importante: dobbiamo pensare alla palla,

translation.en: if everybody can do that as a group, we'll be tough to beat.
translation.it: se lo facciamo tutti, come gruppo, sarà dura batterci.

translation.en: [Shaun] Our particular brand here in this area... we play rezball.
translation.it: Qui si gioca il basket della riserva: il rezball.

translation.en: Let's go. No dribble. No dribble. Go.
Just go hard, just go hard. Don't dribble.
Rezball is a unique style of basketball...
translation.it: Il rezball è un particolare tipo di basket...

translation.en: and suits our strengths.
[player] Rezball's just like running and gunning,
translation.it: Nel rezball si corre e si tira,

translation.en: just pushing the ball, pushing the ball,
translation.it: porti avanti la palla, trovi lo spazio, tiri

translation.en: getting the open shot, taking the shot, coming back down,
translation.it: porti avanti la palla, trovi lo spazio, tiri e poi riparti.

translation.en: and doing the same thing over and over.
translation.it: E fai sempre la stessa cosa.

translation.en: [Shaun] As Navajo people, were not very big in stature.
translation.it: Noi Navajo non siamo molto alti.

translation.en: So, for us to be effective against some of these bigger teams,
translation.it: Perciò, per poter essere efficaci contro squadre più alte,

translation.en: we basically have to run them out of the gym.
[Josiah] Rezball to us is, like, really fun.
So we just like to have fun with it and we love to push the ball.
translation.it: Ci diverte giocarlo e adoriamo correre.

translation.en: Our coach really doesn't like that kind of basketball,
translation.it: Al nostro allenatore non piace molto

translation.en: and tells us to stay away from it.
[Raul] Hold it, hold it, hold it. Now... Hold it.
You're just running around. Make sure you know where you're supposed to go.
translation.it: State correndo a caso. Dovete sapere dove andare.

translation.en: Do it again, do it again.
[Raul] Rezball.
You know...
I really don't understand it, but that's... that's why I asked.
translation.it: Non lo capisco, è per questo che mi hanno chiamato.

translation.en: There's no... structure.
Not there, not there! We--
We're not being patient.
We're trying to take every... first shot that comes around. We don't want that.
translation.it: Proviamo a fare ogni tiro che capita. Non funziona così.

translation.en: Calm down a little bit, you're trying to rush everything.
translation.it: Calmatevi un po', avete troppa fretta.

translation.en: I love to run, as long as there's a structure.
translation.it: Correre va bene, ma dev'esserci una struttura.

translation.en: And I always try to tell the kids, you know, "You have to make the best decision."
translation.it: Provo a dire ai ragazzi: "Dovete prendere la decisione migliore".

translation.en: Okay, hold it, hold it. Yeah. Again.
We're just bunching up, guys. That's not what we want.
translation.it: Siete tutti lì. Così non va.

translation.en: Let's do it again. I want to walk through it.
My job is to teach the kids how to play basketball,
translation.it: Il mio lavoro è insegnare loro a giocare a basket

translation.en: and learn how to play,
and be able to play the game as it should be played.
Recognize it. Move the ball.
There it is, right there.
There you go.
[player] Coach has won championships.
So he has the experience to know,
or he knows what to do to get there.
So that's how, we just follow him.
Defensively is probably the... the thing I'm concerned about.
translation.it: La cosa che mi preoccupa di più è forse la difesa.

translation.en: If everybody plays good defense, then we'll...
translation.it: Se tutti giocano bene in difesa,

translation.en: I-- I guarantee you, it's almost a given that we can do well.
translation.it: vi garantisco che fare bene sarà quasi scontato.

translation.en: Be patient. That's gonna be the difference.
Now, tomorrow, everybody wear slacks,
a dress shirt, a tie...
and hopefully, you shave, okay?
translation.it: e magari, fatevi la barba. Ok?

translation.en: If you... If you look good...
they're gonna say, "Oh, man. These guys mean business."
Okay? Here we go. Break!
[all] One, two, three, Wildcats!
[Raul] You wanna shoot for a few minutes, that's okay.
translation.it: Se volete fare dei tiri, fate pure.

translation.en: Get your jerseys over here so we can put them in the wash.
translation.it: Mettete qui le casacche così le laviamo.

translation.en: [player] Coach, I don't have to shave, right? Am I good?
translation.it: Non devo farmi la barba, vero?

translation.en: Get the laundry.
This year is a... a special group of kids.
translation.it: I ragazzi di quest'anno sono speciali.

translation.en: Because of my background, I'm able to relate them.
translation.it: Per esperienza posso relazionarmi con loro e capirli.

translation.en: I can understand them.
translation.it: posso relazionarmi con loro e capirli.

translation.en: Home wasn't a pleasant situation for me.
translation.it: La situazione in casa mia non era piacevole.

translation.en: I know there's a detergent somewhere, but I don't know where it is.
translation.it: C'è il detersivo, ma non so dove.

translation.en: My mom and my dad divorced when I was a year old.
translation.it: I miei divorziarono quando avevo un anno.

translation.en: So I never saw my dad.
I met him when I was about 13 years old.
He said, "Hi," and I said, "Hi," that was it.
And then he told me that he was an alcoholic,
translation.it: Poi mi disse che era un alcolista

translation.en: and, uh... within a year, he passed on.
translation.it: e un anno dopo era morto.

translation.en: I became personally responsible for my half-brothers and sisters.
translation.it: Dovetti occuparmi dei miei fratellastri e sorellastre.

translation.en: At the time, I had to haul water, chop wood...
translation.it: Dovevo prendere l'acqua, tagliare la legna,

translation.en: did everything a man had to do, because there was no man in the house.
translation.it: fare ciò che deve fare un uomo, perché ero l'unico.

translation.en: I was the... I was the man.
It was hard, but I had no choice.
translation.it: È stata dura, ma non avevo scelta.

translation.en: For me, it was a matter of survival.
Opening up against Snowflake...
It's always... That's a tough game.
It's always a tough game.
And just to open up against them is pretty challenging.
translation.it: Iniziare contro di loro è una vera sfida.

translation.en: Our team...
kind of grew up together.
We always dreamed of winning State.
Uh, this is our year where we could probably make school history,
translation.it: Quest'anno potremmo fare la storia della scuola,

translation.en: 'cause Chinle has never won a state championship before.
translation.it: Chinle non ha mai vinto il campionato statale.

translation.en: So, that would be nice for us to be the first ones to win State.
translation.it: Sarebbe bello essere i primi a farlo.

translation.en: And it would be a big goal for us, be a big dream.
translation.it: Sarebbe un grande traguardo, un sogno.

translation.en: And I would love that very much.
Just probably be a good memory to look back on when we get older. You know?
translation.it: Sarebbe un bel ricordo a cui ripensare da vecchi, no?

translation.en: [Josiah] Around here on the reservation, you can't find a good paying job without a degree anymore.
translation.it: Qui nella riserva, non si trova più un lavoro ben pagato senza laurea.

translation.en: The only way for me to get into college right now is through an athletic scholarship.
translation.it: Per andare all'università mi serve una borsa di studio sportiva.

translation.en: It's really stressful, but...
whenever I want to give up, I just think about my family.
translation.it: ma quando sto per arrendermi, penso alla mia famiglia.

translation.en: As a son, I...
I love him.
Every day, in and out, we hug each other.
translation.it: Se entriamo o usciamo ci abbracciamo.

translation.en: And he's my big baby.
All three of my kids.
Since he was small, he was always active.
translation.it: È sempre stato attivo, fin da piccolo.

translation.en: He went and did a lot of sports.
translation.it: Ha fatto un sacco di sport.

translation.en: I saved all his bibs.
Some of them I put away.
And then, these are all...
all his medals...
here, and... and it is heavy.
Some coaches...
tell him that he's too short,
but then he determines.
He says, "I'll prove you wrong."
And he does.
I'm so proud of my son.
I've always been...
counted out or something just because of my height.
But, you know, that doesn't bother me.
When I'm playing, it feels like I'm just as tall as everyone else.
translation.it: Quando gioco, è come se fossi alto quanto gli altri.

translation.en: You know, I think that strength comes from...
my struggles that I went through as a... as a kid.
I have a lot of good memories with my dad.
translation.it: Ho bellissimi ricordi con mio padre.

translation.en: Kids always think their dads are the best man in the world.
translation.it: Per i bambini il papà è sempre il migliore al mondo.

translation.en: You know, we'd always go to the beach and stuff like that.
translation.it: Andavamo sempre in spiaggia e cose così.

translation.en: One of the funniest things actually was when we went to Washington DC,
translation.it: Uno dei momenti più divertenti è stato a Washington,

translation.en: I think we dressed for summer, but it was snowing over there.
translation.it: noi avevamo gli abiti estivi, ma lì nevicava.

translation.en: [laughs] We ended up just buying jackets, because it was so cold.
translation.it: Abbiamo dovuto comprare delle giacche per il freddo.

translation.en: When we relocated here, it actually took a lot out of us.
translation.it: Trasferirci qui, ci è costato molto.

translation.en: My dad used to actually kind of treat my mom bad sometimes.
translation.it: A volte mio padre trattava male mia mamma.

translation.en: I would see him intoxicated a lot.
Dad left us.
And, you know, I didn't want to believe it.
I'm like, "How could he leave us? How could he do this to us?" You know?
That's when things started going downhill for us.
translation.it: Ha iniziato ad andare tutto a rotoli.

translation.en: We had no running water, we had no electricity.
translation.it: Non avevamo acqua corrente né elettricità.

translation.en: Sometimes, we would have to go to my relatives' to shower.
translation.it: A volte dovevamo andare dai parenti a lavarci.

translation.en: But, you know, my mom, she worked really hard,
translation.it: Ma mia mamma si è data da fare, ha trovato lavoro.

translation.en: she got a job, and now, she got us running water,
translation.it: Ma mia mamma si è data da fare, ha trovato lavoro. Grazie a lei abbiamo acqua ed elettricità.

translation.en: she got us electricity, you know?
translation.it: Grazie a lei abbiamo acqua ed elettricità.

translation.en: She puts food on the table for us.
She does all this for me, and that's why I do what I do,
translation.it: Lo fa per me, perciò faccio tutto questo,

translation.en: because I want to get a... get a scholarship to go to college
translation.it: per ottenere una borsa di studio e andare all'università

translation.en: and, uh, you know, get a good paying job, so I can take care of her
translation.it: e trovare un buon lavoro per prendermi cura di lei

translation.en: the way she took care of me.
I'm happy...
and my kids motivate me to keep going every day.
translation.it: e i miei figli mi motivano ad andare avanti.

translation.en: This is my sister, Tia.
She's gonna be taller than me, 'cause, you know, she had a different dad.
translation.it: Diventerà più alta di me perché ha un padre diverso.

translation.en: I'm going to make sure she becomes a good person you know, be the best person that she can be.
translation.it: Mi assicurerò che diventi la migliore persona possibile.

translation.en: But, definitely, I'm gonna make sure that she's a better person than me.
translation.it: Di certo mi assicurerò che sia migliore di me.

translation.en: I want to be like my brother.
He makes me happy.
When Mom's gone, he hugs me...
translation.it: Mi abbraccia se non c'è la mamma

translation.en: so I can be safe, and...
translation.it: e io mi sento sicura e...

translation.en: -It's okay. -[sniffles]
[crying] So... I want to be just like my brother.
Okay. I think she's done talking now.
It doesn't really matter where you come from, or...
what kind of struggles you had.
It's just how much you can take and keep moving forward.
translation.it: L'importante è tenere duro e andare avanti.

translation.en: Yeah, I shed my tears here and there.
I just keep going, just to always think of my family.
translation.it: ma vado avanti. Penso alla mia famiglia.

translation.en: [Raul] You're a sophomore, you're a senior.
translation.it: NOVE ORE ALLA PARTITA CONTRO SNOWFLAKE

translation.en: We're ready for our picture.
All right, guys.
[Shaun] Our families can have warriors.
Obviously, our tribe has warriors.
And here, our basketball team serves as our school and community warriors.
translation.it: Questa squadra rappresenta i guerrieri della scuola e della comunità.

translation.en: [photographer] One serious. Okay, a serious one.
[Shaun] These young men go out
and represent our people on the basketball court
translation.it: rappresentano la nostra gente sul campo

translation.en: all over the state of Arizona.
Do your crazy pose.
[Shaun] Some of these kids don't have parental figures around.
translation.it: Alcuni di loro non hanno figure genitoriali.

translation.en: [Shaun] The family that they create within themselves on the team,
translation.it: Il gruppo che creano all'interno della squadra,

translation.en: it's literally a second family that our kids are creating.
translation.it: è una vera e propria seconda famiglia.

translation.en: That's exciting to me.
You look like Zion now.
We won't get your muscles all in the frame.
[Raul] This team that we have, they're a young team, but they're very talented.
translation.it: I ragazzi della squadra sono giovani, ma hanno molto talento.

translation.en: [photographer] All right, Cooper, we need a basketball move now.
translation.it: Bene, Cooper, ci serve una mossa di basket.

translation.en: You ready?
[Raul] I always believed that you want your captains to have character... uh, integrity, you know,
translation.it: Sono convinto che ai capitani si richieda carattere, correttezza,

translation.en: things, like... that make them different from everybody else.
translation.it: cose che li differenzino dagli altri e Cooper è...

translation.en: And Cooper is a... I think he's a special young man.
translation.it: cose che li differenzino dagli altri e Cooper è... ...penso sia speciale.

translation.en: Hey! Watch your ankle. Watch your ankle.
So, I say, "Hey, I want you to be one of the captains.
translation.it: Gli ho detto: "Vorrei facessi il capitano. Ti va?"

translation.en: Is that okay with you?"
And he said he'd accept the challenge.
translation.it: E lui ha accettato la sfida.

translation.en: You ready? Three, two, one... Nice.
And for him, as a sophomore,
he's not afraid to take that role and accept it.
translation.it: ma non ha paura di accettare il ruolo.

translation.en: And I told him, I said, "You know,
we're gonna go as far as you take us."
[Cooper] For being a captain is that role to lead everyone and be an example.
translation.it: Essere il capitano significa guidare la squadra ed essere un esempio.

translation.en: It's an honor, you know.
I feel that... a lot of pride from that.
And I use it to, like, push myself, keep that fire in me going,
translation.it: Mi serve a spingermi oltre, a tener viva la fiamma in me

translation.en: to light up the fire in everyone.
[commentator] Cooper Burbank, with the drive.
And the lay-in is good!
What a move by Cooper Burbank!
There's very few players that have come through
translation.it: Sono pochi i giocatori che ce l'hanno fatta

translation.en: with natural talents, like Cooper.
translation.it: grazie al talento naturale, come Cooper.

translation.en: [commentator] Beautifully delivered! Wow!
[Mo] He might be our first Division 1 player out of Chinle.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere il primo giocatore di Chinle nella Division I.

translation.en: [commentator] Pull up shot. Burbank trains to three.
translation.it: Tiro in sospensione. Tre punti per Burbank.

translation.en: [Raul] He's one of those kids that you'll probably see every ten years as a coach,
translation.it: Un allenatore trova un ragazzo così ogni dieci anni,

translation.en: or maybe not at all, you know.
And I think that, by the time he's done here,
translation.it: Penso che quando avrà finito qui,

translation.en: he's gonna be the GOAT of Chinle.
translation.it: sarà il migliore che Chinle abbia mai avuto.

translation.en: You know, he has that potential.
[Cooper] Many people tell me stuff.
Good and bad, you know.
I'm always taught to stay humble, you know.
translation.it: Mi dicono sempre di restare umile.

translation.en: Just, like, be a sponge, you know, and just take it in and get better, keep getting better.
translation.it: Di assorbire tutto come una spugna e migliorarmi sempre.

translation.en: Aah, here's all the players I look up to.
Each person has something
that I watch or take from them.
I admire Stephen Curry with his shooting.
That's my favorite player, Kevin Durant, right there.
translation.it: Quello è il mio preferito: Kevin Durant.

translation.en: The thing I like about Kevin Durant is, like... he is a big man, and...
translation.it: Mi piace perché è grande e grosso...

translation.en: but he doesn't play like it, you know, he...
plays like a point guard, you know? He can dribble and can shoot,
translation.it: Gioca come un playmaker. Sa palleggiare e tirare.

translation.en: things that not even some point guards can do, you know?
translation.it: Fa cose che spesso neanche i playmaker sanno fare.

translation.en: He's doing it as... at the height of almost seven feet tall.
translation.it: E lui lo fa, con i suoi oltre due metri.

translation.en: And that's what I would like to do, as well.
translation.it: Ed è quello che vorrei fare anch'io.

translation.en: As tall as I am, I would like to handle and shoot
translation.it: Con la mia altezza, vorrei gestire la palla e tirare

translation.en: just like him.
I'd like one day for someone to have, like...
my name across their back or something, or even a poster of me.
translation.it: ...portasse il mio nome sulla schiena, o avesse un mio poster.

translation.en: [woman] Don't you have the roster?
The roster? I have a copy of it on one of the clipboards. Look for the clipboard.
translation.it: Ne ho una copia in una delle cartelline. Cerca la cartellina.

translation.en: You organized this.
-Like the blind leading the blind. -[both laugh]
Right here.
Okay. See, I told you it was on a clipboard.
translation.it: Sapevo che era in una cartellina.

translation.en: That part, I was right.
Ah, this is an old one.
Well, tell the guys to come and get their jerseys.
translation.it: Dì ai ragazzi di venirsi a prendere le casacche.

translation.en: -Okay. -That way we'll know
-what jerseys they have. -Okay.
[Josiah] Nervous for the season.
People have so much expectation for us.
We don't want to let them down.
We don't wanna give Chinle a bad rep.
translation.it: Non vogliamo dare una cattiva reputazione a Chinle.

translation.en: It's not gonna fit. [chuckles] So...
Even if I do roll it up a few, I don't think it will fit me.
translation.it: Nemmeno se li arrotolo un po'.

translation.en: Look at that. Look at that! [laughs]
[Chance] Our away games are pretty far.
We basically just sleep on our away games,
and getting home late at night at 12:00.
translation.it: e torniamo a casa verso mezzanotte.

translation.en: We have to go to school the next day.
translation.it: Il giorno dopo c'è la scuola.

translation.en: It's kind of hard, but it's fun. [laughs]
[commentator] Hi, everyone, from Lobo Gymnasium in Snowflake, Arizona.
translation.it: Salve a tutti dalla palestra di Snowflake, Arizona.

translation.en: Welcome to Northland basketball. A big one tonight to kick off things,
translation.it: La nuova stagione stasera inizia alla grande

translation.en: as two of the top teams in Arizona's 3A conference meet up.
translation.it: con l'incontro di due tra le squadre più forti.

translation.en: That'll be us.
The pre-season rankings came out two days ago
and Chinle starts off in the ninth spot.
The Lobos of Snowflake,
they're ranked number eight.
And come February, the top 24 teams in Arizona make the state playoffs.
translation.it: A Febbraio, le prime 24 affronteranno i playoff del torneo statale.

translation.en: Raul Mendoza certainly wants to be in that group.
translation.it: Raul Mendoza vuole sicuramente essere in quel gruppo.

translation.en: [Cooper] We can be pretty good, you know, we've got everything.
translation.it: Possiamo far bene. Abbiamo quello che serve:

translation.en: We've got the speed, we've got shooting, we've got rebounding.
translation.it: la velocità, il tiro, il rimbalzo.

translation.en: So, we just need to put it all together
and make... and be one team.
[Raul] Yeah. A couple of things...
Don't take the first shot that's open.
translation.it: Non provate ogni tiro che capita.

translation.en: Make sure that we... we take the shot that we can... that we want, not what they give us.
translation.it: Assicuratevi di ottenere il tiro che volete, non quello che ci concedono.

translation.en: Another thing, don't get in a hurry.
When they press us, we're not gonna get in a hurry,
translation.it: Quando ci marcano non perdiamo la calma,

translation.en: we're gonna get it across the court and set up and run the offense.
translation.it: attraversiamo il campo e organizziamo l'attacco.

translation.en: If they're big, like I heard they are,
then it's gonna be hard for them to get up and down the court.
translation.it: sarà dura per loro andare avanti e indietro

translation.en: We wanna go up and down the court, 'cause that's our strength.
translation.it: È il nostro punto di forza.

translation.en: Josiah, he'll... he'll... he'll go. He's in shape.
translation.it: Ci penserà Josiah. È in forma.

translation.en: He's not gonna get tired. He's just gonna run as hard as he can. Okay?
translation.it: Non si stancherà. Correrà il più possibile. Ok?

translation.en: You're from the Navajo reservation.
We're here representing Chinle.
[Cooper] Let's go, let's go!
[Raul] A lot of people came from Chinle, and they're here.
translation.it: Sono venuti in molti da Chinle.

translation.en: -What up, Mo? -Yeah!
[Raul] It's something that motivates you to play hard.
translation.it: Questo ci spinge a dare il massimo.

translation.en: This is a chance for you guys to show what you can do as a team.
translation.it: È l'occasione di dimostrare cosa potete fare come squadra.

translation.en: [commentator] This ought to be a great matchup tonight.
It's a contrast in style.
The Lobos are a big team, the Wildcats a little bit small, a little bit quicker.
translation.it: L'altezza dei Lobos, contro la velocità dei Wildcats.

translation.en: A legend on the rez, Coach Raul Mendoza.
translation.it: Una leggenda della riserva: Raul Mendoza.

translation.en: We'll get a first look at his team in action.
translation.it: Vedremo la sua squadra in azione.

translation.en: Hey, the stands are full with devoted Wildcat fans
translation.it: Ci sono molti tifosi dei Wildcats

translation.en: and they're looking to start their season on the right foot, as they get set to tip it up.
translation.it: e vogliono iniziare la stagione al meglio, si preparano a cominciare.

translation.en: [Raul] Behind you!
Snowflake controls the tip.
And they immediately blow past Josiah Tsosie
for the easy lay-in.
[Raul] Come to the ball!
Josiah Tsosie turns the ball over and Snowflake takes it up the floor.
translation.it: Josiah Tsosie perde palla e Snowflake la recupera da terra.

translation.en: Come on. It was a weak pass.
Gotta take the ball the other way.
Hey, let's get a good shot.
Let's go. Get a good shot.
Ball goes into the left corner.
Cooper Burbank for three.
And the shot is good.
And the Wildcats are on the board.
Burbank again on the drive and...
Oh, a wild shot by Cooper.
[Raul] Gotta shoot it, go far up there.
We're just making mental mistakes.
You can't take shots like that.
If you don't have a shot,
just dribble it out or pull up,
You know, throwing it up is not gonna help us a whole lot.
translation.it: Tirare a caso non ci servirà a molto.

translation.en: Josiah Tsosie hits Burbank with a very nice feed
translation.it: Bel passaggio di Tsosie per Burbank

translation.en: and he finishes it off.
Josiah Tsosie in the corner. The three is up. The three is good.
translation.it: Josiah Tsosie dall'angolo. Il tiro da tre è buono.

translation.en: It was a bumpy start, but Coach Mendoza got his team turned around,
translation.it: Un inizio infelice, ma Mendoza ha sistemato le cose

translation.en: and now they're in a nice groove.
translation.it: e hanno trovato il ritmo, sono in vantaggio di 11 punti

translation.en: The Wildcats have grabbed an 11-point lead here at the break.
translation.it: e hanno trovato il ritmo, sono in vantaggio di 11 punti a metà partita.

translation.en: [Raul] Now... the thing that's killing us right now
is that we're doing things we're not supposed to do.
translation.it: Allora, stiamo sbagliando a voler fare certe cose.

translation.en: We missed lay-ups, we just tried to finger roll.
translation.it: Non abbiamo cercato i tiri giusti.

translation.en: Don't get greedy and try to force it when it's not there.
translation.it: Non siate ingordi, non provateci se non si può.

translation.en: The idea is not how many shots we... we take,
translation.it: Non si tratta di quanti tiri facciamo,

translation.en: it's how many good shots we take.
translation.it: ma di quanti vanno a segno.

translation.en: That's the difference between an average team, a mediocre team, and a good team.
translation.it: È la differenza tra una squadra media, una mediocre e una buona squadra.

translation.en: The team that do the little things, that make the lay-up,
translation.it: La squadra che pensa ai dettagli, al terzo tempo,

translation.en: make the free throws, make the good passes...
That's gonna be the difference.
You know, right now, we're up,
-but we've got a whole half to go, guys. -[Cooper] Let's go.
translation.it: ma siamo solo a metà, ragazzi.

translation.en: Back to the action here at Snowflake High School
translation.it: Si torna in azione alla Snowflake,

translation.en: early in the second half. It's been all Wildcats.
Cooper Burbank, the crossover... pull up...
The shot is good.
-Wildcats' lead has grown to 18. -[whistle blows]
translation.it: Il vantaggio dei Wildcats è salito a 18.

translation.en: We're up! We can go further, but we've gotta be smart.
translation.it: Possiamo scappare, ma dobbiamo essere furbi.

translation.en: Hey, don't beat ourselves. Let's go.
[commentator] Josiah Tsosie trapped, his pass, right to the Lobos,
translation.it: Raddoppio su Josiah Tsosie, i Lobos prendono palla,

translation.en: they'll take it the other way and there's the lay-in.
Be patient.
Josiah Tsosie drives, forces up the shot, gets off the mark.
translation.it: Josiah Tsosie, forza il tiro, sbaglia.

translation.en: [Raul] Josiah!
And Snowflake has got the ball again.
[Raul] Shoot us out of the game.
Go get him.
He just wants to shoot the ball.
Coach Mendoza has decided to give his point guard a rest.
translation.it: Mendoza ha deciso di fermare il playmaker.

translation.en: He heads to the bench with eight points... but five turnovers.
translation.it: Va in panchina con otto punti e cinque palle perse.

translation.en: Come on. You gotta get your head in the game.
Snowflake jump shot, eight.
Snowflake might have a pulse here.
They score a couple of quick buckets, give their fans some hope.
translation.it: Un paio di canestri danno speranza ai tifosi.

translation.en: [Raul] We can't let 'em get back in the game.
We have to be disciplined.
Play better defense. Okay?
Lobos on the drive, the dish, Cooper steals the pass.
translation.it: Partono i Lobos, Cooper ruba palla sul passaggio.

translation.en: It's knocked away... and it might have gone off Cooper's legs.
translation.it: Viene spinta via, potrebbe averla toccata con le gambe.

translation.en: And it's Snowflake's basketball.
-Cooper! -[whistle blows]
-He's just not there. -Yeah.
Stay in the game!
Don't... Don't space out!
-Hey, focus on what you're doing. -[buzzer sounds]
[commentator] The Wildcats' lead is dwindling.
The Lobos are not gonna go away quietly.
translation.it: I Lobos non si arrenderanno facilmente.

translation.en: They keep hanging around out there.
[Raul] Listen, keep playing!
Don't give up!
You gotta want it more than they do!
[commentator] And the game is tied, 69-69.
Unbelievable.
The Snowflake Lobos have battled
all the way back from 18 down to knotted up.
translation.it: fino a rimontare 18 punti di svantaggio.

translation.en: The Wildcats need somebody,
anybody to step up on offense.
-[Raul] Time out. -[whistle blows]
Now, listen. This is what we're doing.
Cooper, you're right here.
You're gonna act ike you're gonna set the pick,
translation.it: Fai come se volessi portare un blocco

translation.en: and just go, okay?
And then Josiah, you're here.
Okay? One of you guys are gonna get it.
translation.it: Uno di voi ce la farà.

translation.en: So, with the game on the line, it looks like Josiah Tsosie is coming back in.
translation.it: Manca pochissimo, sembra che Josiah Tsosie rientri in campo.

translation.en: [all] One, two, three, WIldcats!
Snowflake with pressure defense,
Chance Harvey brings it up the left side and up from there.
translation.it: Chance Harvey si sposta sul lato sinistro.

translation.en: Back to the top, Josiah Tsosie has it.
And a pass nearly stolen by the Lobos.
translation.it: I Lobos rubano palla sul passaggio.

translation.en: But Burbank picks it up, saves it for the Wildcats.
translation.it: La riprende Burbank per i Wildcats.

translation.en: Sixty-nine, sixty-nine.
Dewayne Tom on the right angle. Nothing there for him.
Passes it up, swing it around left side.
Seconds to play.
Cooper Burbank from the corner,
a three up and good!
The Wildcats have made the shot,
translation.it: I Wildcats hanno trovato il tiro

translation.en: and Chinle is gonna come away
translation.it: e Chinle si porta a casa

translation.en: with a victory at Snowflake, 72 to 69,
to begin their brand-new season.
[Raul] Okay, we've gotta look at this tonight as something to learn from.
translation.it: Ok, questa partita ci serve da lezione.

translation.en: Good to win, but again, look at how we played.
translation.it: Abbiamo vinto, ma pensate a come abbiamo giocato.

translation.en: All those mental mistakes...
We can't have it.
We could have beat them by 15 or more, easily.
But we seem like we...
When we got ahead, some of you guys relaxed. You can't do that.
translation.it: Non potete mollare quando siamo in vantaggio.

translation.en: You gotta keep playing through the whole thing.
Otherwise, you know, it was a win...
but this is something you... In order to beat a tough team,
translation.it: ma per essere una squadra forte,

translation.en: you've gotta be mentally tough too.
I thought mentally, we lost in the second half.
translation.it: Nella seconda parte non è stato così.

translation.en: We weren't there mentally, and that was the biggest thing. That's just something you've gotta learn.
translation.it: Non avevamo la testa in campo ed è la cosa fondamentale.

translation.en: Look at yourself in the mirror and say, "What did I do that I need to correct?"
translation.it: Guardatevi allo specchio e dite: "In cosa devo migliorare?"

translation.en: All of us can go down and say, "What did I do that I need to correct?"
And that's how you become better as individuals.
translation.it: Così ci si migliora come persone.

translation.en: And as a team, we're gonna get better as we go.
Okay?
Break. Go.
-[Cooper] Wildcats on three. -One, two, three. Wildcats!
translation.it: Al tre. Uno, due, tre. Wildcats!

translation.en: Put your jerseys in one area so we can pick them up.
[Raul] As a head coach, I've seen kids that are very... talented,
translation.it: Come allenatore ho visto ragazzi con molto... talento,

translation.en: very good players,
but didn't even get a chance to go to state playoffs.
translation.it: che non sono mai arrivati neppure ai playoff statali.

translation.en: [player] My man, 27 points, Coop!
[player 2] Damn, Coop.
[Raul] Good shot, Coop.
I always try to get the kids to understand that getting into the playoffs is a special thing.
translation.it: Provo a far capire ai ragazzi che arrivare ai playoff è speciale.

translation.en: A lot of it is the mental thing.
Everything has to fall in place to win the state championship.
translation.it: Per vincere, ogni cosa dev'essere al suo posto.

translation.en: You know, this team that we have, we have a group of seniors.
translation.it: In questa squadra ci sono ragazzi dell'ultimo anno.

translation.en: We're gonna lose 'em next year.
You know, our guys have to learn
to realize the urgency, I guess you could say.
We have the capability of winning the whole thing.
translation.it: Abbiamo le capacità per vincere tutto.

translation.en: Why not go for it now?
It's your time to accomplish the impossible,
translation.it: È il vostro momento di ottenere l'impossibile,

translation.en: which is something that we've never done here in Chinle, win a state championship.
translation.it: una cosa mai fatta qui a Chinle: vincere un campionato statale.

translation.en: So I'm hoping that the kids are starting to begin to understand that this... this is it.
translation.it: Spero che i ragazzi inizino a capire che si tratta di questo.

translation.en: This is the time to do it.
This is the year.
